tidbits.title: Rich Ottoman Heritage
tidbits.description: Bosnia and Herzegovina bear the marks of Ottoman rule in its architecture, cuisine, and traditions, seen in historic bridges like the iconic Stari Most in Mostar.

tidbits.title: Natural Beauty
tidbits.description: The country is blessed with stunning natural beauty, including the emerald-green waters of the Neretva River and the picturesque landscapes of the Dinaric Alps.

tidbits.title: Complex Cultural Blend
tidbits.description: Bosnia and Herzegovina blend Slavic, Ottoman, and Austro-Hungarian influences, creating a diverse cultural mosaic reflected in its arts, music, and festivals.
